title: You Are My Glory
overview: ‎Qiao Jingjing and Yu Tu attended high school. Qiao Jingjing confessed twice to Yu Tu, but was refused both times. Ten years later, Qiao Jingjing becomes a celebrity. She wants to sponsor a video game, but her gaming skills are very bad. To save Qiao's reputation, her manager invites her to a video game competition. By chance, she meets Yu Tu there, who works as an aerospace engineer and currently wants to change careers. At Qiao's request, Jingjing Yu Tu becomes her game coach. And they gradually fall in love with each other.‎
